title: Beddua: The Curse
occurrences: But as far as I see, she doesn't know who to curse either.
As mentioned in the hadith, a curse rises to the sky...
her guardian angels can't move because of this curse.
If this curse finds its target...
you have to wait for this curse to work so that this girl will find peace.
help whoever is exposed to this girl's curse.
Beware of the curse of the innocent victim!
Because there's not a curtain between Allah and the curse of the innocent.
